thread.title: Customer ken kuzenski
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Customer ken kuzenski

author: Customer ken kuzenski
title: Customer ken kuzenski
text: I've been shopping at thriftbooks for a few years now. The website is easy to use, they've got an amazing selection, and the couple of times I've needed customer service, it's always been fast, helpful, and friendly. Can't say enough good things about thriftbooks! They're GREAT!
